duplicates.fragment:
name: Sync Labels
on:
  workflow_dispatch: {}
  push:
    paths:
      - .github/labels/labels.yml

jobs:
  sync:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      contents: read
      issues: write
      pull-requests: write
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      # Uses a well-maintained action that reads YAML/JSON and syncs labels safely.
      - name: Sync labels from registry
        uses: EndBug/label-sync@v2
        with:
          config-file: .github/labels/labels.json
          delete-other-labels: false

[
  { "name": "bug", "color": "d73a4a", "description": "Broken behavior or incorrect output" },
  { "name": "perf", "color": "0e8a16", "description": "Performance regression or optimization" },
  { "name": "robustness", "color": "0366d6", "description": "Resilience: retries, backoff, failure handling" },
  { "name": "security", "color": "b60205", "description": "Vulnerabilities, secrets, permissions/ACL" },
  { "name": "observability", "color": "1d76db", "description": "Logs, metrics, traces, health, diagnostics" },
  { "name": "infra", "color": "6f42c1", "description": "Hosting, deployment, CI/CD, runtime" },
  { "name": "architecture", "color": "5319e7", "description": "Cross-cutting design, interfaces, carve-outs" },
  { "name": "devx", "color": "c2e0c6", "description": "Developer experience, tooling friction" },
  { "name": "docs", "color": "0b75a8", "description": "README, guides, runbooks" },
  { "name": "lint", "color": "cccccc", "description": "Ruff/formatting cleanups" },
  { "name": "typecheck", "color": "bfdadc", "description": "mypy/pyright typing issues" },
  { "name": "tests", "color": "a2eeef", "description": "Unit/integration/e2e tests" },
  { "name": "commands", "color": "7057ff", "description": "Text/slash command behavior, permissions, UX" },
  { "name": "data", "color": "168700", "description": "Sheets schema, caching, adapters, migrations" },
  { "name": "config", "color": "006b75", "description": "Env vars, toggles, YAML/JSON config, secrets" },

  { "name": "P0", "color": "ee0701", "description": "CRITICAL — user-visible breakage / hotfix" },
  { "name": "P1", "color": "fbca04", "description": "HIGH — core function degraded / urgent" },
  { "name": "P2", "color": "0e8a16", "description": "MEDIUM — important, not blocking" },
  { "name": "P3", "color": "cccccc", "description": "LOW — cleanup/polish" },
  { "name": "P4", "color": "e6e6e6", "description": "VERY LOW — icebox/backlog" },

  { "name": "severity:critical", "color": "ee0701", "description": "Mirrors P0" },
  { "name": "severity:high", "color": "d93f0b", "description": "Mirrors P1" },
  { "name": "severity:medium", "color": "fbca04", "description": "Mirrors P2" },
  { "name": "severity:low", "color": "cccccc", "description": "Mirrors P3/P4" },

  { "name": "bot:reminder", "color": "0052cc", "description": "Reminder bot" },
  { "name": "bot:welcomecrew", "color": "0052cc", "description": "WelcomeCrew bot" },
  { "name": "bot:matchmaker", "color": "0052cc", "description": "Matchmaker bot" },
  { "name": "bot:achievements", "color": "0052cc", "description": "Achievements/Claims bot" },

  { "name": "comp:commands", "color": "7057ff", "description": "Text/slash, permissions, UX" },
  { "name": "comp:scheduler", "color": "0366d6", "description": "Jobs, timers, offsets" },
  { "name": "comp:health", "color": "1d76db", "description": "Health endpoint, digest, diagnostics" },
  { "name": "comp:config", "color": "006b75", "description": "Env vars, toggles, secrets, YAML/JSON" },
  { "name": "comp:data-sheets", "color": "168700", "description": "Google Sheets schema, reads/writes, adapters" },
  { "name": "comp:cache", "color": "0e8a16", "description": "Caching layers / TTL / cold start" },
  { "name": "comp:roles", "color": "c27ba0", "description": "Role grants, achievements, approvals" },
  { "name": "comp:onboarding", "color": "c27ba0", "description": "Tickets, welcome flow, forms" },
  { "name": "comp:placement", "color": "c27ba0", "description": "Clan matching, recruiters, moves" },
  { "name": "comp:ocr", "color": "5319e7", "description": "Image parsing pipeline" },
  { "name": "comp:shards", "color": "5319e7", "description": "Shard/mercy tracking logic" },
  { "name": "comp:ops-contract", "color": "6f42c1", "description": "Ops parity: ping/health/digest/reload" },

  { "name": "needs:triage", "color": "fef2c0", "description": "Awaiting label & priority" },
  { "name": "ready", "color": "0e8a16", "description": "Groomed and ready for pickup" },
  { "name": "blocked", "color": "b60205", "description": "Blocked by dependency or decision" },
  { "name": "help wanted", "color": "008672", "description": "Community contributions welcome" },
  { "name": "good first issue", "color": "7057ff", "description": "Low-risk starter task" }
]
